Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI was more general, whereas my teacher was more specific, so therefore it was not as helpful.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher was more critical, whereas, I feel GenAI tried to almost always give compliments, which is not always a good thing, especially if I am wanting to know if I am on the right track with a project or assignment
